welcome.title: Hi!
content: Welcome to my personal site!. I developed this place with the purpose of showing my professional experience through the projects in which I have participated, as well as the skills and knowledge that I have acquired.
I like mobile devices, tablets and other innovative gadgets for solving common problems in daily and professional life. I love to development in mobile and web environments.

career.title: My Career
content: With the knowledge acquired in development of Java, I am confident to implement solutions in embebbed systems, hybrid mobile platforms or native, mainly Android.

I want to acquire techniques for development in more platforms that help to increase productivity in the different technological sectors. I am ready to continue learning, creating new ideas, and do my best effort in the tasks assigned to me.

2010: ACM - Latin American Regional Contest, Puebla
2009: 5S Methodology

profession.title: TAXI 2.0
summary: All-in-one service to establish a communication link between the taxi driver and the passenger.
It adds the use of technology in a local city facilitating the public transport service and incrementing quality, eficiency and profits.

profession.title: SmartMenu
summary: All-in-one service for restaurants where the traditional menu evolves to show detailed information to the customers and interact to see how the dishes look like, add them to an order, or request the account. At the same time, it allows management in: sections of the menu, preferences and reports about how your business is working.
It adds the use of technology in the restaurant business in its processes incrementing quality, production and profits.

profession.title: SARA (Radiological Administrative System)
summary: Project where the design, development and implementation of a system for the management of a radiological cabinet was accomplished.

It consists of several modules that cover the different areas of the business such as: patient reception, study capture, administrative reports, catalogs of studies and prices, patient history and radiological interpretation.

profession.title: Watchman System
summary: System developed for the control of routes, movements and times of the tours of the surveillance personnel.

It allows to visualize the revisions made in a report format to evaluate the effectiveness of the personnel in their routines and checks by the administrator. It also allows for the management of surveillance personnel and the check-up control team.

Implemented in the Tecnológico de Monterrey Campus Central of Veracruz with the fundamental objective of maintaining a control and monitoring of the correct work of the personnel of supervision favoring the security in the campus and agility in the event of an emergency.

profession.title: Process Management
summary: Web application for the storage and revision of diagrams and manuals of the processes that involve the different areas of the departments. Focused on the self-training of the new human resource in its corresponding area.

Implemented in the Tecnológico de Monterrey Campus Central of Veracruz with the fundamental objective of maintaining order and control of the processes carried out by the personnel, as well as their study for the rotation of the human resource.

profession.title: 5S Methodology
summary: Web application to manage the information of the program of quality where it is possible to keep track of evidences, the comments and to take the histories of the internal audits.

Implemented in the Tecnológico de Monterrey Campus Central de Veracruz with the fundamental objective of raising the quality of service and attention, for which it uses as strategy the methodology of '5S' creating a clean, safe and orderly work environment, in which Facilitates the accomplishment of the daily tasks giving results like services with quality and low costs.

profession.title: Braille Display
summary: Project in charge of the research and development team as part of the Social Service of the Tecnológico de Monterrey Campus Central de Veracruz.

Construction of a low-cost Braille display, a device capable of transforming electronic PDF books into the reading and writing system of blind people, the Braille code. This will reduce the digital trouble that exists for this sector of the population.
The activities carried out: creation of the use algorithm, software libraries for the translation of books and interaction of the device with the user, development of simulator as prototype.

profession.title: Web Site 'Fundación Roma'
summary: Promotion of 'Fundacion Roma A.C.' through information technologies to raise awareness of society and provide guides on the services provided.
The project implements the design, creation and deployment of a website taking into account the characteristics of Human-Computer Interaction and user needs.

academic.title: Advertising Spots
summary: Application development in Android for tablets that allows to display promotional videos in order to be placed in businesses or commercial establishments.
Perform a remote synchronization to keep the ads that need to be updated without having to manipulate the device.

academic.title: Software Methodology
summary: Real world application that applies temporal reasoning within the context of the processes carried out in the software development lifecycle.
It determines, from the inconsistencies and redundancies in their relations, the most complete and adaptable methodology in software projects.
The following methodologies are analyzed: cascade, iterative, spiral.

academic.title: Encryption System
summary: In order to demonstrate the results of MD5 and RC4 encryption algorithms, a program was developed that allows the encryption of text phrases or files in MD5, RC4 or in a combination that increases the security of encryption.

academic.title: Online store
summary: Development of a Business-to-Consumer e-commerce site for the search and sale of products.
Allow customers to access the product catalog remotely, search and select the products they are going to buy through a shopping cart.
It implements a section for administrators that allows to manage the products: registrations, declines, and modification of the data of registered products.

academic.title: Raffles and Sweepstakes
summary: Application for the resolution of raffles and sweepstakes with the innovation of the use of the mail as means of communication to publish the results.
It allows reading from a text file the data of the participants to select the winner. You also have the option to send mail to all participants notifying the winner.

academic.title: Travel Agency
summary: Project developed for the package management of a travel agency. The system focuses on people who confirm and create customer travel packages. It allows to make hotel reservations, car rentals and airline tickets and cruises. It is also possible to analyze the most relevant tourist information of the registered destinations.
It includes the option to manage the services offered and the stock of tickets or reservations available.

academic.title: Congress web site C10
summary: In order to promote the Tenth International Congress of Industrial Engineering and Information Technology, which is held every year by the ITESM veracruz, this website was developed to inform about everything related to the congress.

academic.title: Parking lot
summary: The program represents a simulation for a 24-hour parking lot.
It is created to facilitate the maintenance and control of parking in terms of the organization of the cars and the rate according to the time parked. It is also possible to keep a profit check.
It also includes an animation that allows you to see how cars enter and leave from the parking lot.

personal.title: Chronoverse
summary: Project for ReactJS and agile web techologies learning. Thhis can be deployed and publshed as a progressive app, web app or Android App.

personal.title: Personal Web Site v2.5
summary: Developed with the purpose of showing my professional experience through the projects in which I participated, as well as the skills and knowledge that I have acquired. It makes use of different javascript utilities in websites.

personal.title: Mind Challenge
summary: A classic game where the goal is to find 10 pairs discovering the images that are the same.
Test your memory by playing with the challenge mode to find all the pairs mistakenly the least amount of times, or play in classic mode to have a fun time.
Be one of the lucky ones discovering all the pairs. But while that happens... How many pairs can you find ...?

personal.title: Simon says . . .
summary: Have fun with this classic game while you exercise your memory. Achieve the challenge of repeating the sequence of the illuminated buttons to win the game.
You can start with the classic mode or, if you think you're ready, you can try the different game modes it offers.
You are ready...? Well, let's start: Simon says ...

personal.title: Looking for the Treasure
summary: Try your luck to find the treasure that is hidden in some of the chests before the time runs out.
Become the best treasure hunter, finding help tracks and winning in the different game modes.

personal.title: Cat's game
summary: The classic cat game, also known as 'Tic Tac Toe' or 'Three in a Row', in a new version. You can play between two players or face a challenge to beat the computer.
Relive this game and show your skills by finding the cat locked up.

personal.title: Calendar
summary:
A simple application to view the current date and time. You can also browse and view the months. You can also change the clock format and search for a date with the month and year.
It is a very useful tool that can not miss to use with your agenda.
